content: Had an insightful conversation with a teacher about AI in education. They're seeing students engage with material in ways they never did before. The AI is sparking creativity, but we've got to keep refining.
Presented our AI's progress at an international AI ethics forum. The feedback was constructive, and we're now focusing on how AI can enhance critical thinking without overshadowing human judgment.
Just got a new round of funding for the Ethical AI Institute. It's not just money; it's a vote of confidence in our mission to shape the future of education through ethical AI.
Had a moment of doubt when our AI suggested a controversial piece of art. But it led to a deep discussion about the ethics of AI-generated content. We're learning to navigate these gray areas.
